name: Magical Star Dome!
description:
Nerbun and Quail have teamed up with a friendly sky spirit

Magical Star Dome is a quick game made for the rpgmaker.net 9th Birthday Game Jam, which focused around the concept of threes. The devs had around an hour to complete the game.

This game requires the RPGMaker VX Ace Runtime package to play. You can install it for free here: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/dow...
